trunk_status.map: function(doc) { if ( ! doc.trunk_type ) return; emit([doc.acct_id, doc.call_id], doc.doc_type == 'reserve' ? 1 : -1); }

trunk_type.map: function(doc) { if ( typeof doc.trunk_type == 'undefined' ) return; emit([doc.acct_id, doc.call_id], doc.trunk_type); }

flat_rates_available.map: function(doc) { var trunks = doc.trunks || 0; if ( doc.type == 'debit' ) { emit(doc.acct_id, trunks * -1); } else { emit(doc.acct_id, trunks); } }

release_errors.map: function(doc) { if ( ! doc.release_error ) return; emit([doc.acct_id, doc.call_id], doc.amount); }
